venue.name: Scibelli Enterprise Center, across from STCC, downstairs media room

item.description:
Hello all,

Jack Clemente from Startup Helping Hand will be our featured presenter for the April public, open-door event.

Startup Helping Hand is a new service in the area. It offers a la carte services for startups and businesses. Those who subscribe to the service may choose a space with a cubicle at the Holyoke Mall location of the Startup Helping hand. All those who subscribe to the service have access to professional aid from experts in areas that a starting business needs the most - legal, accounting, funding, mentoring, and so on.

 

This meeting will be in a Q&A informal format, so bring a list of questions about services you need help with for your own business or idea.

 

Startup Helping Hand website URL is:

http://startuphelpinghand.com/

 

Startup Helping Hand also has a Meetup group of its own:

http://www.meetup.com/Startup-Helping-Hand-Entreprenuer-Resources-Holyoke-Mall/

 

 

IRN co-organizers wish to ask all attending to pass the word around about this great event to their co-workers, friends, and relatives.

 

Partial list of services which Startup Helping Hand provides:

Financial Services
Legal and Patent Advice
Business Concept Evaluation
Marketing and Brand Development
Design and Website Development
Funding Presentation Development
Explore Our Access to Over 500 Franchises
On-Demand Sales Force, Focused on Assisting Startups
Workshops Tailored To Address the Current Needs of Our Members
Hands-on Support, Guidance and Assistance On Developing a Business Plan
Assistance With Establishing the Necessary Funding to Launch the Business
Prescreening and Guidance on Exploring the Best Funding Sources For the Venture
Affordable Co-working Office Space, Conference Rooms, and Cubicles. All Available By the Hour, Day and Month
Access to the Real Estate Community to Locate and Fill Suitable Vacant Retail/Office Space
Collaboration With Local Resources to Assist and Nurture Our Entrepreneurial Ecosystem
item.name: Public meeting - Startup Helping Hand, Jack Clemente
